name: Mirrim (Game Jam Entry)
description:
An entry for the Weekly Game Jam #148 (WIP). The theme is mirrors. This is my first ever entry to a game jam!

Mirrim is a puzzle / platformer where the player can change gravity by entering mirrors.

If you really like what you see and want to encourage me to do more stuff like this, why not throw some loose change in my general direction? 

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/SpaceOtter
